ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They called on their companion and he set to it and hamstrung her.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But they called their commander, who seized and hamstrung her.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Eventually, they summoned their companion, and he undertook the (outrageous) task and hamstrung the she-camel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They called together their companions and agreed to slay the she-camel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In response they called their companion – he therefore caught and hamstrung the she-camel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But they called their comrade and he took (a sword) and killed (her).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But they called their companion, so he took (the sword) and slew (her).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then they called their comrade, and he took in hand, and hamstrung her.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But they call their comrade and he took and hamstrung (her).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But they called their companion who took a sword and hamstrung her.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then they called their fellow, and he took the sword and hamstrung her,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But they called their companion, and he took [a knife] and hamstrung [her].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But they called to their companion, and he took a sword in hand, and hamstrung (her).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But they called their comrade and he took (a sword) and killed (her).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But they called their companion who took hold of her and hamstrung her.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But they called their friend, and he dared, and he slaughtered.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But they called their companion, and he dared and hamstrung [her].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [54:29] But they called their companion, Qudār, to slay it, so he took, he drew his sword, and he hamstrung, with it the She-camel, in other words, he slew her in compliance with their wish.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But they called their comrade) he called Masda' and Qudar Ibn Salif after Masda' Ibn Dahr shot her with an arrow (and he took) and Qudar took another arrow (and hamstrung (her)) killing the she-camel and dividing 629 her meat.
